<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">学编程，意味着要选择一种编程语言，那么很容易产生的疑惑就是：选哪种编程语言？为什么要有那么多的编程语言？<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">先来看为什么要有那么多的编程语言：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 15pt; line-height: 22.5pt; background-color: rgb(246, 247, 250); vertical-align: baseline; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1</span></b><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">：应用领域不同，导致需要的是不同的编译效率和代码质量以及执行速度的要求<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">底层是用户发出操作上层的各个软件发出所有指令的最终汇聚点，都要去控制<span lang="EN-US">CPU</span>。相当告诉公里上的收费站，所有车辆都要汇聚到这里。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;
letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-no-proof:yes"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>

  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>

  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>

</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img width="580" height="230" src="quiver-image-url/622417A040BF740C4476750232F87ED9.jpg" alt="0：编程领域内为什么要有那么多的语言？" v:shapes="图片_x0020_1"><!--[endif]--></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">所以要求处理速度快，代码质量高，能用一句的绝不用两句，那么就意味着不能有很复杂的编译过程、同时代码质量要高、精简，不能笨重。显然应该直接写机器码，起码也得写汇编语言，一步到位就能得到机器码。再不济也得用<span lang="EN-US">C</span>语言，但为了开发起来友好点，想方便一点，<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>也霸蛮的允许，因为它里面有面向对象可以极大的方便编程。但再不能是<span lang="EN-US">java</span>了或者<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>以及<span lang="EN-US">JS</span>这些了。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">所以比如嵌入式领域或者底层驱动领域，你就不会看到用<span lang="EN-US">JAVA</span>和<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>去写驱动就是这个原因。为了任务分配合理，开发人员偷懒，选择了引入操作系统，但也通常也只能是小的被裁剪了的操作系统内核，如<span lang="EN-US">uclinux</span>，也绝不能是那种直接在电脑上运行的庞大的操作系统如<span lang="EN-US">win7</span>，<span lang="EN-US">win8,win10</span>，<span lang="EN-US">redhat,centos</span>；否则就意味着要么你的系统性能下降，要么就需要你的硬件升级。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 15pt; line-height: 22.5pt; background-color: rgb(246, 247, 250); vertical-align: baseline; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2</span></b><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">：使用的领域不同，导致侧重点不同。而不是编程语言本身的好坏。那么平常说的好坏只是对开发人员的友好性而言。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;
letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-no-proof:yes"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape

16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">比如：<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>是面对应用领域的开发语言。要求的是快速看到效果，友好性好。因此就不太在乎比<span lang="EN-US">C</span>语言多损耗了点编译性能和多集成一些库了。所以，它的最大特点就是：把<span lang="EN-US">N</span>多常用的库都集成进来了，让你用起来简单的多，如：<span lang="EN-US">mysql</span>连接库，<span lang="EN-US">mysqli</span>链接库等。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">但这并不能说明<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>就比<span lang="EN-US">C</span>语言好，只是对用户开发起来友好而已，只是他们用的领域不同而已。如果从驱动领域来说，<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>谈不上比<span lang="EN-US">C</span>语言好！如果从开发微信交互来说，<span lang="EN-US">C</span>语言谈不上比<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>好。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 15pt; line-height: 22.5pt; background-color: rgb(246, 247, 250); vertical-align: baseline; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;

"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">：开发时间决定<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">如：<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>重要的是应用，应该在短时间内开发出应用，那就不能从头到尾的写，否则内容太多，比如你不可能从汇编写起来，否则功能还没写出来，几个月就过去了，所以<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>领域内会出现很多很多的框架和<span lang="EN-US">CMS</span>系统，这些系统虽然参差不齐，有的代码质量本身就很差劲，但是能看到效果啊，<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">至于晚几毫秒，用户也根本体验不到，所以开发速度就要比代码本身的质量效率和解析效率要重要的多。否则，<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>的应用定位就失去了意义，它就不能说自己是面向应用领域的上层语言了，那是什么？鬼知道！<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">所以要求开发速度、能马上见到效果的领域，就要开发起来变得很简单，那么就得用上层的面向对象的方式去支撑。所以，<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>的开发就是直接用面向对象来应用。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">那么用汇编和<span lang="EN-US">C</span>语言去写非常好看的图形化界面，它的意义只在于学习，而不在于实际应用。你写了好几天的引入各种的图形库函数库最后看到个红颜色，还不如<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>里写一条控制<span lang="EN-US">CSS</span>的<span lang="EN-US">color:red</span>来的省事呢，当然用<span lang="EN-US">CSS</span>就更加省事了。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">所以学习什么和实际怎么使用，之间还有一个赛选的味道。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 15pt; line-height: 22.5pt; background-color: rgb(246, 247, 250); vertical-align: baseline; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">4</span></b><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">：用户体验度、友好性决定<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;
letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-no-proof:yes"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="图片_x0020_4" o:spid="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="3：编程领域内为什么要有那么多的语言？"
 style='width:558pt;height:329pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'>
 <v:imagedata src="file:////Users/zhaofeng/Library/Group%20Containers/UBF8T346G9.Office/msoclip1/01/clip_image004.jpg"
  o:title="3：编程领域内为什么要有那么多的语言？"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img width="558" height="328" src="quiver-image-url/2C704FBF7DDA8BD139718F2EFA6B3759.jpg" alt="3：编程领域内为什么要有那么多的语言？" v:shapes="图片_x0020_4"><!--[endif]--></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">很多人在写<span lang="EN-US">C</span>语言的时候感觉很头痛，因为<span lang="EN-US">C</span>语言友好性不好（虽然比汇编还是友好点），特别是它的字符串处理很是麻烦，经常容易错，又难以理解，用起来一点都不如中上层语言方便，如：<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>如<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>如<span lang="EN-US">Java</span>；友好程度也不如他们。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">比如：<span lang="EN-US">C</span>语言你编程很可能经常会被报告指针不能读和写！但<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>，不会动不动给你弹出指针错误的那种恐怖的窗口。因为它做了很多包容性好的异常处理。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">但这是需要消耗编译性能和速度的。所以：<span lang="EN-US">C</span>语言明明可以引入这些，但是为了让编译效率高就是不引入。这就是<span lang="EN-US">C</span>语言为什么那么多年了就是停留在面向过程的级别。而<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>就会把这些东西都早已集成进来了。那么意味着每次都要加载那么多的东西，势必效率就会慢。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">这样自然不能用在操作速度要求很快的比如操作系统任务分配里了，也不能用在驱动里了，因为经常要经过这些动作，你每次都笨重，自然速度就慢。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">但这并不能说明<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>就比<span lang="EN-US">C</span>语言好，也不能说明<span lang="EN-US">C</span>语言比<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>好。如果走到他们各自擅长的领域，他们比谁都好。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;background:yellow;mso-highlight:yellow;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">各门语言因为自己定位在不同的应用领域，所以它的编译器（或者叫解释器）即使语法功能没做的那么智能和强大，也不会去升级，否则就失去了它的应用定位的意义。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;background:yellow;mso-highlight:yellow;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">这就是<span lang="EN-US">C</span>语言里为什么就到面向过程就打止了的原因。不是不可以引入面向对象类的解析功能，而是引入了会导致编译器解析速度和效率的降低，<span lang="EN-US">C</span>语言就会成为一个应用领域不明确的四不像的语言。就失去了本身的意义。所以不再引入。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><b><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">由此可见：其实编程语言本身其实谈不上好和坏，只是应用领域的不同而已。所以选择什么编程语言，就看你要朝哪方面去走了。</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><b><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">其实这么多的语言，编程思想上没什么区别。只要学懂编程思想，一切语言都通。</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">既然没有什么好坏之分，编程思想也是相通的，那么就是看你怎么才能学懂编程和以后想做什么了。学习顺序和学习方法就很重要。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">学编程思想，得先从<span lang="EN-US">C</span>语言去看，学会面向过程编程思想；<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">然后从<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>去看，学会面向对象编程思想。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">然后去学一门应用范围广的语言，比如<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>，如：<span lang="EN-US">JAVA</span>，如<span lang="EN-US">C#</span>。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">因为由于编程思想是相通的，所以<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>的面向过程和面向对象的语法可以推理出一多半，这样就可以给<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>的学习减负了许多许多…<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">至于你选择什么上层语言，就看你以后想工作在什么领域，这就又要和未来的发展趋势来结合一起考虑了，你想做驱动，想做嵌入式底层，那你就和苦涩无味的<span lang="EN-US">C</span>语言打一辈子交道，忍受它的开发麻烦的困扰。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-bottom: 18pt; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#2B2B2B;letter-spacing:.4pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">但是以后移动互联<span lang="EN-US">+</span>的影响会越来越深入和广大，<span lang="EN-US">PHP</span>的方向是一个很不错的方向…一个人不能做两个甚至多个行业的事情，否则如果你不是够聪明，很可能什么都不精通！慎选。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>
